review: Movie was really good. The movie is complete blend of Politics,Love,Sex Lust, Betrayal,Bad intentions. Jimmy Shregill, Randeep Hooda,Mahi Gill and everyone else did a fantastic role. Screenplay of the movie kept audience engaging with the story. sex scenes could have been reduced but still this is a good movie to watch because the storyline is completely different. Tigmanshu Dhulia did a wonderful direction.

The dialogues feel real and the story is tight , this is when I discovered tigmanshu bhaisahab for myself
Edit: this is for the first film
